author: KATE FELDMAN
title: Mark Wahlberg, Patriots fan, leaves Super Bowl before comeback
text:
Mark Wahlberg, diehard Patriots fan, leaves Super Bowl before epic comeback Mark Wahlberg, Patriots fan, leaves Super Bowl before comeback Mark Wahlberg left the Super Bowl early to take care of his sick son. (Patrick Smith/Getty Images) Monday, February 6, 2017, 12:03 AM 
Marky Mark became The Departed during the Super Bowl. 
Mark Wahlberg, a lifetime Patriots fan, snuck out of NRG Stadium before his team was able to complete an improbably comeback to beat the Falcons 34-28. A photo posted by Mark Wahlberg (@markwahlberg) on Feb 5, 2017 at 8:43pm PST 
The Boston native was filmed leaving the stadium before the Patriots came back from 28-3 with less than three minutes left in the third quarter to score 31 unanswered points. 
After the game, Wahlberg posted a family photo with wife Rhea Durham and sons Michael and Brendan and explained that his youngest wasn’t feeling well. The Patriots pulled off an improbable comeback to beat the Falcons 34-28. (Darron Cummings/AP) 
“Trust me, I would have loved to be at the stadium — but family first,” he wrote. “Doesn't mean I don't love my Patriots too!” Join the Conversation:
